size.desc: Size in CSS units, including unit name or standard size name (xs|sm|md|lg|xl)
size.desc_cn: 带有 CSS 单位的尺寸大小，包括单位的名称或标准大小名称（xs | sm | md | lg | xl）

tag.desc: HTML tag to render, unless no icon is supplied or it's an svg icon
tag.desc_cn: 要呈现的HTML标记，除非未提供图标或它是svg图标

name.desc: Icon name following Quasar convention; Make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix; If 'none' (String) is used as value then no icon is rendered (but screen real estate will still be used for it)

color.desc: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
color.desc_cn: 组件的颜色，来自 Quasar 调色板的颜色名称

left.desc: Useful if icon is on the left side of something: applies a standard margin on the right side of Icon
left.desc_cn: 如果图标位于某个对象的左侧，则很有用：在图标的右侧应用标准边距

right.desc: Useful if icon is on the right side of something: applies a standard margin on the left side of Icon
right.desc_cn: 如果图标位于某个对象的右侧，则很有用：在图标的左侧应用标准边距
